text: @RandPaul How is it that someone who voted AGAINST emergency funding of this pandemic, was able to get testing without critical symptoms? People are being told to stay home until their symptoms get worse to the point of respiratory distress..some have died as a result⁉️ #GOPBetrayedAmerica
